data.name: DEADCRAFT Demo
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel i5-3470 / AMD FX-8300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 960 / Radeon HD7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: DEADCRAFT contains blood and gore, drug references, intense violence, strong language, and suggestive themes.
